data.eml:eml: Five new species of Hypseloecus Reuter (Hemiptera: Miridae) on hemiparasitic Santalales from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yeshwanth, H. M. (2014): Five new species of Hypseloecus Reuter (Hemiptera: Miridae) on hemiparasitic Santalales from India. Zootaxa 3878 (1): 75-88, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3878.1.6
